gift_source:
::MC1::
What does incremental SfM reconstruction do?
{
= Adds views step by step
~ Uses only one image
~ Ignores new views
~ Compresses histograms
}
title: MC1
question: What does incremental SfM reconstruction do?

gift_source:

{

}

question: What does triangulation do in SfM?
